means: Applicability in Transport and Traffic of Artificial Intelligence 人造智能运输机和交通适应性

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"达到"之意。
means: attain ：侧重指在抱负或雄心的激励下，以最大的努力去达到一般所不及或不敢追求的目的。
reach ：常用词，指到达某一空间、时间、目标或发展过程中的某一点。
achieve ：侧重为达到目的所需的技巧、忍耐和努力。
arrive ：指得出结论，达成某项协议或作出某一决定等。

sentence.Network_en: Top-ranking sumo wrestlers attain superstar status.
sentence.Network_cn: 顶尖的相扑选手可获得超级明星的地位。

sentence.Network_en: The cheetah can attain speeds of up to 97 kph.
sentence.Network_cn: 猎豹的奔跑速度每小时可达97公里.

sentence.Network_en: The day is not far off when China will attain prosperity.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国的兴盛是可以计日程功的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... asymmetry 不对称（现象） attain 达到; 完成; 获得 attract 吸引.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... asymmetry 不对称（现象） attain 达到; 完成; 获得 attract 吸引.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... attack vt. / n. 攻击，袭击 attain v. （经过努力）获得, 得到 attempt vt. 试图，尝试.
字典中入字的解释 ... (11) 入朝,指属国、外国使臣或地方官员谒见天子[ go to court] (13) 到达[ attain] (15) 侵入[ invade].

list.abs: 社会学专业词汇中英文对照_百度文库 ... 寄宿学校: boarding school 教育程度: educational attainment 继嗣规则: descent rule.
attain v.达到，实现attainment n.成就【结束语】A thing of beauty is a joy forever.美的事物是永恒的喜悦！
academic atmosphere 学业风气academic attainment 学力academic environment 学习环境
外企HR那些事儿[荐]_职业女性_天涯论坛 ... M=Measurable 可衡量的、 A=Attainable 可达到的、 R=Relevant 具有相关性、.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the senses 'bring to justice' and 'reach (a state)'): from Old French ateindre, from Latin attingere, from ad- 'at, to' + tangere 'to touch'

entry.def: If you attain something, you gain it or achieve it, often after a lot of effort.

example.ex: Jim is halfway to attaining his pilot's licence.
example.tran: 吉姆就快要拿到飞行员执照了。

entry.tran: 达到，进入，实现（某种状态或情况）
entry.def: If you attain a particular state or condition, you may reach it as a result of natural development or work hard to attain this state.

example.ex: ...attaining a state of calmness and confidence.
example.tran: 达到镇定自若、信心十足的状态

means.word_mean: 2. reach a point in time, or a certain state or level;

sentences.sentence: "This car can reach a speed of 140 miles per hour"
"the archeologists chanced upon an old tomb"
"The hikers finally struck the main path to the lake"

means.word_mean: 4. reach a destination, either real or abstract;

sentences.sentence: "We barely made it to the finish line"
"I have to hit the MAC machine before the weekend starts"

auth_sentence.res_content: His creative approach allowed him to attain his goal.

auth_sentence.content: It is a way to attain life without boundaries.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: attain[v.达到;获得]+able可以……的→adj.可到达的,可得到的
pertain[[v.属于,关于]]男→adj.恰当的;有关的
contain包含,容纳+er表名词→n.容器;集装箱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演
stems_affixes.word_buile: entertain娱乐,招待+ment表名词→n.款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
stems_affixes.word_buile: retain[[v.适合,保持,保留]]→n.保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
attain[v.达到;获得]+ment表名词→n.完成,成就

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,容纳;容忍,抑制;可被……除尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+tain拿住,握住,支撑→全部拿住→包含,容纳
de加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿住,拿下→拘留

stems_affixes.value_cn: 娱乐, 招待, 接受, 怀抱
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入,走进+tain挽留→使……挽留→休息,娱乐

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,供养,坚持,主张,支持
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man+tain拿住,握住,支撑→用手拿住→坚持
ob加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿到,获得
per始终+tain拿住,握住,支撑→始终拿着→属于,关于
re回来+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿回来→保留
sus下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

Sentence.sentence: Students with high hope set themselves higher goals and know how to work to attain them,' Doctor Snyder said.

means.word_mean: （通常经过努力）实现, 达到, 获得，得到

sentences.en: He attained the position of minister.
She attained her ambition of becoming a pilot.
sentences.cn: 她实现了成为一名飞行员的志向。

jushi.english: He survived the war and attained a great age.
jushi.chinese: 他在战争中幸免于难，活到了很大的年纪。

jushi.english: He has attained the highest grade in his music exams.
jushi.chinese: 他在音乐考试中获得了最高分。

jushi.english: India attained independence in 1947, after decades of struggle.
jushi.chinese: 在几十年的斗争之后，印度于1947年获得了独立。
